channel.title: Stefano Guerrini - Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Stefano Guerrini - Developer

item.title: Hi, I'm Stefano
item.description: I was born in Messina 24 years ago, but I live in Milano. I work primarily with Java, I like to learn new technologies. I’ve always been drawn to coding, I’m a technology lover, I love damn to have many doubts and ask myself many questions. I want to improve always myself! Also I like to have often new objectives. I consider myself a person dynamic and smart, always funny, and when is necessary a serious and finicking developer.
